TopicTitle: How do the Youtubers get such cool camera movement?

Articles.Content: I've been watching a lot of tutorials, and I see a lot of amazing camera work. Some of it I can figure out, but some I just don't see how it is done.  I did see there is a camera tools mod.  Is this what a lot of them are using or are their tricks in the stock game?

If you are looking for a specific effect or camera position, you should link a video showing the scene, but in general, it is just the mod you already know about. The mod is pretty self-explanatory, you may want to try it on your own: https://github.com/jrodrigv/CameraTools/releases/tag/v1.10.0
^^This. Camera Tools is how they get those cool shots.
And while we're talking about Camera Tools, does anyone know of any videos or tutorials explaining how to get the best out that mod?
